text: Lawrence Sidney Mithen (born 15 April 1934) is an Australian rules footballer. He played for Melbourne in the VFL from 1954 until 1962. Mithen was born in Melbourne, Australia. He played for Claremont Football Club in the WAFL in 1966 and 1967 for a total of 34 games.WAFL FootyFacts: Mithen, Lawrence Sidney. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Laurie Mithen
